content:
Hey,

Just a small message in English to state that we’re almost done. I’m going to ask the other members to join here. The communication inside the team will be in French for obvious reasons and we will tag streams with (english) for communication like this one.

For French translators, the URL you want to want to work on translations is: <https://pontoon.rust-lang.org/fr/rust-www>. Please notify us when you start working on something so that we know who does what. Thanks!
